SustnUomConversion.name: SustnUomConversion
SustnUomConversion.description: Represents information about the unit of measure conversion for the additional fuel types defined by a customer.

ConversionFactor.description: The conversion factor that's used to convert values from one unit of measure to another for the fuel type.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record.

FuelType.description: The name of the fuel type. For custom fuels, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_wood, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, custom_wood.

Language.description: The language associated with this record.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.

SourceUom.description: The source unit of measure for the fuel type. For custom fuel unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.

TargetUom.description: The target unit of measure for the fuel type. For custom fuel unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.
